title: Emotional State Screening (Demo)
description: Short demo test to identify key emotional indicators.

questions.text: How often do you feel part of a group of friends?
How often do you feel that there are people who really understand you?
How often do you feel that no one really knows you well?
How often do you feel that people are around you but not with you?
I try to push away the thought that life will end.
It frightens me when I realize how many choices life offers.
I am afraid that I will never know myself at the deepest level.
When the question of whether life has meaning enters my mind, I try to think quickly about something else.
I felt that everything I did was an effort.
I felt hopeful about the future.
I had trouble keeping my mind on what I was doing.
I felt that I could not shake off the blues even with help from my family or friends.
I feel like an outsider.
I am able to relate to my peers.
I catch myself losing a sense of connectedness with my society.
I am in tune with the world.
I kept trying to think of ways to solve a problem but never tried any of the solutions.
I took time off responsibilities simply because I was too tired or didn’t feel like going in.
I structured my day’s activities.
I engaged in a wide and diverse array of activities.
